name: LXC Daemon
description: Ensures the LXC service is running (for LXC-capable hosts).
check_cmd: if command -v lxc-info >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active lxc >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart lxc || true; fi
verify_cmd: if lxc-ls >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
